verses.roman:
aṅga-sevā govindere dilena īśvara
jagannātha dekhite calena āge kāśīśvara

synonyms: aṅga-sevā—taking care of the body; govindere—unto Govinda; dilena—He gave; īśvara—the Supreme Personality of Godhead; jagannātha—the Jagannātha Deity; dekhite—while going to visit; calena—goes; āge—in front; kāśīśvara—of the name Kāśīśvara.
translation: Govinda cared for the body of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, whereas Kāśīśvara went in front of the Lord when He went to see Jagannātha in the temple.
